div.head: Plates
div.p:
on namo nārāyaṇāya[+|] jayatu nija-khaḍga-sādhita-nikhila-dharāmaṇḍalaika-patir anavadya[ḥ*][+|] cālukya1533-bhīma-nr̥patir bhaya-nata-ripu-nr̥pati-makuṭa-lālita-caraṇaḥ[+||](1) svasti[+|] śrīmatāṁ sakalabhuvanasaṁstūyamānamānavyasagotrānāṁ hāritīputrāṇāṁ kauśikī-vara-prasāda-labdha-rājyānāṁ mātr̥gaṇa-paripālitānāṁ svāmi-mahāsena-pādānudhyānāṁ bhagavan-nārāyaṇaprasāda-samāsāditavara-varāha-lāñchanekṣaṇakṣaṇavaśīkr̥tārāti-maṇḍalānām aśvamedhāvabhr̥tha-snāna-pavitrīkr̥tta-vapuṣāṁ[+|] cālukyānāṁ1534 abhūd vaṁśe vijayāditya-vallabhaḥ[+|] satyāśraya iti khyāta-nāmnāpi bhuvi viśrutaḥ[+||] (2) tasyānujaḥ prabhuḥ khyāto viṣṇuvarddhana-saṁjñitaḥ[+|] sa durjjayaṁ samuccāṭya veṅgī-maṇḍalam āptavan[+||] (3) aṣṭa(u)-daśa ca varṣāṇi kr̥tvā saurājyam uttamam[+|] yayau nāka-vadhū-bhogavāṁchayā marutāṁ padam[+||] (4) tat-putro jayasimhākhyo bhūri-siṁha-parākramaḥ[+|] trayas-triṁśat-samāḥ pr̥thvīṁ(m) (a)bhuṁkt[v]ā1535 catur-aṁbudhi[ṁ*][+||] (5) viṣṇurājas tad-anujasyendrarājasya nandanaḥ[+|] sa dhātrīn nava varṣāṇi pālayām asa [l*]ilayā[+||] (6) 1536
Face IIa. tasyāpi tanayo maṁgi-yuvarājākhya-bhūpatiḥ[+|] nyāyenāpālayad dhātrī[ṁ vatsarā]n paṁcaviṁśatim1537[+||] (7) tasmāj jātaḥ sutaḥ śrīmān jayasiṁho mahīpatiḥ[+|] sa trayo-daśa varṣā[ṇi] rājyaṁ cakre nr̥pottamaḥ[+||] (8) dvaimāturas tad-anujaḥ kokkilir nnāma viśrutaḥ[+|] ṣaṇ-māsa-mātram e[vā]sau pālayitvāmucad dharām1538[+||] (9) tad-agrajas tu vikhyāto viṣṇuvarddhana-nāmavān[+|] saptatriṁśat-sa[māḥ] pr̥thivī[ṁ]1539 rarakṣa sakalām imām1540[+||] (10) sūnus tadīyo vijayāditya-nāmā mahīpatiḥ[+|] so [+’]pi pāli[ta]vān urvvīm aṣtau daśa ca vatsarān[+||] (11) viṣṇu-bhūpas tato jāto viṣṇuvad bali-marddanaḥ[+|] ṣaṭtriṁśad-vatsarān dhatrīm āpālya prayayau divam1541[+||] (12) tasya sūnur abhūd dhīman vijayāditya-saṁjñitaḥ[+|] aṣṭottara-śata-khyāta-yuddha-labdha-jayonnatiḥ[+||] (13) tāvaṁty eva punaḥ kr̥tvā śaṁbhor āyatanāny api[+|] catvāriṁat-samāḥ pr̥thvīṁ1542 pralīnārim apālayat[+||] (14) viṣṇuvarddhana-nāmābhūt tat-sūnur vvijitāhitaḥ[+|] so’(o)pi varṣaṁ sa-ṣaṇ-māsaṁ bubhuje dharaṇī-talam1543[+||] (15) jātas tasyāpi sūnur nnirupama-vijayāditya-nāma mahīśo prakhyātaś śaradendūj[j*]vala-dhavala-yaśo-vyāpta-dik-cakravālaḥ[+|] nānā-dvīpāntarābhyāgata-para-narapa-śrīmad-uttuṁga-mauli- -sthānūnāṁghri-dvayābjaḥ pr̥thu1544-guṇa-nilayas satya-ratnākarāṁkaḥ1545[+||] (16)
Face IIb. sa catvāriṁśataṁ cābdān caturaś ca tataḥ param1546[+|] nyāyenāpālya dharaṇīṁ purandara-puraṁ gataḥ[+||] (17) tasyānujaḥ prabhuḥ khyāto vikramāditya-saṁjñitaḥ[+|] trāsa-namrāri-[bhū]pāla-mauli- mālārccita1547-kramaḥ[+||] (18) atha nissanna-bhūpālād gāmakāṁbābhavat sūtā[+|] lakṣmīr iva mahāṁbudheḥ1548 pārvvatīva himācalāt[+||] (19) tasyāṁ 1549 gāmakāṁbāyāṁ vikramāditya-bhūpateḥ[+|] pārvvatyām andhakārātes sūnur gguha ivābhavat[+||] (20) cālukya-bhīma-nāmāṁkaḥ cālukhya-kula-varddhanaḥ[+|] garbbhastha1550 eva bhūrājya1551-paṭṭabandhārcchito janaiḥ[+||] (21) yaj-janmamātreṇaivātra dharmmo niścalatāṁ gataḥ[+|] vedā gauravam atyaṁtaṁ loke satyaṁ pratiṣṭhitam[+||] (22) parjjanyaḥ kāmavarṣitvaṁ jagat sarvvaṁ nirītitām1552[+|] durjjanā vilayaṁ sarvve sasyaṁ cākr̥ṣṭa-pacyatām1553[+||](23) yasya pratāpa-santāpa-khidyamānās sadā dviṣaḥ[+|] pādacchāyān na muṁcanti dvīpāntara-samāgatāḥ[+||] (24) yat-prasāda-taror aindram apakva-phalavat padam1554[+|] yasya krodhānalasyāpi vahnir aurvvaḥ kaṇāyate[+||] (25) kāliṁgān kosalān1555 apy aṭavija-nr̥patīn oḍra-nāthan udīcyān[+|] prācyān lāṭān avantīn malayaja-sahitān koṁkaṇān cola-pāṇḍyā[n*][+|] (n)sarvvān1556 etān vijitya prakaṭita-mahimā cāru-kīrttiṁ digantām1557[+|] prāpayyāsthāpayad yo nirupama-caritaḥ śrī-jaya-staṁbham āṁtam[+||] (26)
Face IIIa. tatra1558 cālukya-bhīma-nr̥patau rājyaṁ kurvvati sati[+||] āsīd divākaro nāma mahāsārtthākhya-vāṁśajaḥ[+|] oṟeyūr-ggrāma-vāstavyo dharmma-śīlo dayāparaḥ[+||] (27) tasmāt tū ka[di]yaśreṣṭhi-nāmā jātas sutottamaḥ[+|] ādyatvena maha[t*]tvena kuberañ cātyaśeta yaḥ[+||] (28) tasmād yaḥ ponnakāṁbāyāṁ jāto [vai]śyādhipas sutaḥ[+|] khyātaḥ poleyanākhyo1559 yaḥ satya-vāg anaghaḥ śuciḥ[+||] (29) yasya śrī-bhavanājira[ṁ] dvija-pada-prakṣālanāṁbu(ṁ)-sphutam1560 nityaṁ karddamatāṇ nayaty atitarāṁ yenoddhr̥taṁ svaṁ kulam1561[+|] [kr̥]tvā ya[ś ca] śivālayaṁ surasarit-tīre prayāge [+’]dadāt taṁ dharmmaṁ vara-bhīma-bhūmipataye cālukya-bhīmeśvaram[+||] (30) tasmai vaiśyeśvarāya poleyanākhyāyaiva guṇa- viśiṣṭāya1562[+|] (31)1563 sa rājā cālukya-bhīma-nr̥patiḥ kākamrānu-nāma-grāmaṁ brāhmaṇebhyo dātum agrahāram adāt[+|] da[t]tvā ca sa eva rājā rāṣṭrakūṭa-pramukhān kuṭuṁbina āhūyettham ājñāpayati[+|] viditam astu vo [+’]smā[bhir] omger-mmārgga-viṣaye kākamrāṇu-nāma-grāmaḥ sarvva-kara-parihāreṇa brāhmaṇebhyo dātuṁ poleyanaśreṣṭhine1564 datta iti[+|] sa ca poleyanaśreṣṭhī tadānīm eva brāhmaṇebhyas1565 taṁ grāmam adāt[+|] tatra samasta-grāmaṁ1566 sama-pravibhāgatvena [dvau] bhāgau kr̥tvā pūrvva-svāmibhyām ekam arddham anyān
Face IIIb. guṇavad-brāhmaṇān ṣaṭkarmma-niratān śruti-śāstra-pāragān anviṣya tebhya[ḥ*] aparam arddham1567[+|] te ca brāhamaṇāḥ sva-nāma-gotrābhyāṁ labdhāṁśa-pramāṇena ca pr̥thak1568 pr̥thak1569 kathyante[+|] kauśika-gotrāya cāmyanabhaṭṭāya eṟvvākotsava-prathamahala-dhāvana-vināyakotsava-mūkapaṭalaka-śulka-sahitā1570 atra grāme daśa bhāgāḥ[+|] kauṇḍinya-gotra-bhāskarabhattāya dvau bhāgau[+|] kāśyapa-gotra-jannayabhaṭṭāya[+|] harita-gotra-viṭṭeyabhaṭṭāya[+|] bhāradvāja-vennamabhaṭṭāya1571[+|] etad-gotra-mereyabhaṭṭāya[+|] harita-gotra vennamabhaṭṭāya[+|] kauṇḍinya-gotra-govarddhanabhaṭṭāya[+|] bhāradvāja-kāmadeva-trivedi1572-bhaṭṭāya[+|] tad-gotra-vennamabhaṭṭāya[+|] ātreya-gotra-komareyabhaṭṭāya[+|] bhāradvāja-vennamabhaṭṭāya[+|] kata-gotra-nandamabhaṭṭāya[+|] kapi-gotra-vīṟamabhaṭṭāya[+|] etebhyaḥ praty ekam ekaiko bhāgaḥ[+|] gārgya-gotra-tūrkamabhaṭṭāya dvau bhāgau[+|] bhāradvāja-revama-nāma-dvivedāya[+|] etad-gotra-divākara-dvivedāya[+|] etad-gotra-ṟuddapa-dvivedāya[+|] bhāradvāja-sarvvaya-dvivedāya[+|] etad-gotra-mādhava-dvivedāya[+|] [doṇapoḍi]1573-caturvvedāya[+|] cikita-gotra-revama-dvivedāya[+|]
Face IVa. [bhā]radvāja- ṟuddapa-dvivedāya[+|] kauṇḍinya-poteya-dvivedāya[+|] harita-cāmikuṟṟa-dvivedāya[+|] ebhyo dvivedebhyaḥ praty-ekam ekaiko bhāgaḥ[+|] bhāradvāja-gotra-kannama-kramavide eko bhāgaḥ[+|] kāśyapa-gotra-vennamaśarmmaṇe dvau bhāgau[+|] tad-anuja-kuṇḍiśarmmaṇe eko bhāgaḥ[+|] kāśyapa-vāmanāya trayo bhāgā[ḥ*][+|] tad-gotra-viddamaśarmmaṇe catvaro bhāgāḥ[+|] harita-gotra-kandeya-kramavide arddha-bhāgaḥ1574[+|] kāśyapa-gotra-bhīmaśarmmaṇe dvau bhāgau[+|] vatsa-gotra-potamaśarmmaṇe dvau bhāgau[+|] kāśyapa-siddhamaśarmmaṇe catu[r*]-bhāgāḥ1575[+|] vatsa-gotra-vikramaśarmmaṇe dvau bhāgau[+|] kauśika-gotra-nāgadevāya dvau bhāgau[+|] bhāradvāja-gotrāya dāmaśarmmaṇe dvau bhāgau[+|] meṇḍeya-dvivedi[ne*]1576 tri-khaṇḍikā[ḥ*][+|] mereyaśarmmaṇe dvau bhāgau[+|] mūlaghatika-śubhākaraśarmmaṇe[+|] kauṇḍinya-mayindamaśarmmaṇe[+|] tad-gotra-koṇḍamaśarmmaṇe[+|] kauśika-gotra-divākaraśarmmaṇe[+|] tad-gotra-mādhavaśarmmaṇe[+|] tad-gotra-divākara-peddeyaśarmmaṇe[+|] vennamaśarmmaṇe[+|] harita-meṟeyaśarmmaṇe[+|] harita-nārāyaṇaśarmmaṇe[+|] kauṇḍinya-vimalasamudrāya[+|] harita-droṇaśarmmaṇe[+|] nārayaṇaśarmmaṇe[+|] vatsa-gotra-sarvvadevaśarmmaṇe[+|] etebhyaḥ1577 praty ekam ekaiko bhāgaḥ[+|]
Face IVb. kāśyapa-gotrāya bhavasvāmibhaṭṭāya dvau bhāgau[+|] tad-gotrāya mahākālabhaṭṭāya eko bhāgaḥ[+|]1578 vājasaneyi-kāśyapa-gotrāya vikramayyaśarmmaṇe dvādaśa bhāgāḥ[+|] bhāradvāja-gotra-koṇḍya[ma]-ṣaḍ-aṅga-vedavide eko bhāgaḥ[+|] vājasaneyi-kauśika-gotra-beṇayaḍiśarmmaṇe trayo bhāgāḥ[+|] tad-gotra-bejayitaśarmmaṇe trayo bhāgāḥ[+|] tad-gotra-bikyaṇaśarmmaṇe trayo bhāgāḥ[+|] vatsāra-gotrāya nāgāṁba-putrāya kanīyase kuṇḍiśarmmaṇe dvau bhāgau[+|] parāśara-gotrāya paṇḍaraṅgaśarmmaṇe eko bhāgaḥ[+|] kauśika-gotrāya cāmyaṇabhaṭṭāya pañca bhāgāḥ[+|] vājasaneyi-kāśyapa-gotrāya cāmyanaśarmmaṇe trayo bhāgāḥ[+|] vājasaneyi-kāśyapa-gotrāya potamayyaśarmmaṇe dvau bhāgau[+|] bhāradvāja-gotrāya ailamaśarmmaṇe eko bhāgaḥ[+|] kauśika-gotrāya bhīmaśarmmaṇe paṁca bhāgāḥ[+|]
Face Va. kāśyapa-gotrāya dāmaśarmmaṇe dvau bhāgau[+|] gautama-gotrāya doṇeya-kramavide eko bhāgaḥ[+|] tad-gotrāya cāmyana-kramavide sārddha-bhāgaḥ[+|] kauṇḍinya-goleya-kramavide eko bhāgaḥ[+|] harita-vennama-kramavide eko bhāgaḥ[+|] bhāradvāja-sarvvadeva-kramavide kāśyapa-keśava-dvivedāya kauṇḍinya-keśava-kramavide lohita-śrīdhara-kramavide praty ekam arddha-bhāgaḥ[+|] kauśika-śrīdhara-kramavide khaṇḍikā-trayam1579[+|] bhāradvāja-nandiśarmmaṇe eko bhāgaḥ[+|] śrīvatsa-gotrāya bavvaṇaśarmmaṇe eko bhāgaḥ[+|] tad-gotra-mācyaṇabhaṭṭāya dvau bhāgau[+|] bhāradvāja-gotrāya tāḻamaśarmmaṇe eko bhāgaḥ[+|] kauśika-gotra-kautamabhaṭṭāya dvau bhāgau[+|] harita-gotra-vennama-kramavide eko bhāgaḥ[+|] suvarṇṇakāra-bhīmanāya akkasāla-sahitaṁ tri-khaṇḍika-kodrava-bīja-pramāṇa-kṣetraṁ dattam[+||]
